title: A sermon preach'd at the Church of St. Mary le Bow to the Societies for Reformation of Manners, June 26, 1699 by Edward Lord Bishop of Gloucester.
author: Fowler, Edward, 1632-1714.
notes: Half title: The Bishop of Gloucester's sermon preached before the Societies for Reformation of Manners, June 26, 1699.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
